content: MFT-FOX VT M Bracket Vertical fiberglass bracket - Medium ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Thermal bridge-free solution Glass-fiber reinforced plastic and aluminium compound for low thermal conductivity and high load performance Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Fixing clip assists installation by providing 40 mm adjustment Easier installation – helping hand and clear markings to simplify bracket fastening and rail alignment Applications Suitable for low-energy buildings, Passivhaus and Minergie standard Suitable for low-energy buildings ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Polyamide, EN AW-6063 T66 Width: 62 mm Height: 80 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Polyamide, EN AW-6063 T66 | Width | 62 mm | Height | 80 mm ### ITEMS- 2096973 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 140 M 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096974 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 140 M 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096975 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 160 M 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096976 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 160 M 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096977 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 180 M 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096978 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 180 M 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096979 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 200 M 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096980 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 200 M 11 - Package Size 25 pc
